project_abstract.cdata: The Highway Maintenance and Engineering Project for Dahomey consists of: (a) a four-year highway maintenance program (part one) providing for: (i) the strengthening and reorganization of the road maintenance organization; and (ii) the overhaul and renewal of the highway maintenance equipment fleet, reorganization of the maintenance shops and purchase of equipment for the soil laboratory; and (b) detailed engineering and bidding documents for reconstruction of about 320 km of primary highway (part two).
